<h1
  className={"openapi__heading"}
>
  Sends a batch of messages to Connxio
</h1>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v2/messages/{integrationId}/batch"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Sends a batch of messages to Connxio
